ygData.subject: RE: Lullaby interrupting casters
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm, I was using it with great success in Permafrost.  At this point I m of the opinion that either Lullaby was changed (the instant wake-up someone
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 2 Aug 1999, Kyle wrote:
>
> I was finding this whilst soloing in Perma the other night too. The only
> thing I can think of is that they are somehow completing the spell before
> the nod affects them even though they are still going through the somatics.
> With restarting Lullaby every pulse to get the short pulse I was
> interrupting less than 25% of the time.

Hmm, I was using it with great success in Permafrost. At this
point I'm of the opinion that either Lullaby was changed (the
instant wake-up someone pointed out may be to blame), or mob
spellcasting delays were reduced.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
